content.rendered:
NOW HIRING:

SKI & SNOWBOARD INSTRUCTORS/CADET POSITIONS AT SUMMIT WEST

LOVE TO SKI OR SNOWBOARD?
ENJOY SHARING YOUR PASSION WITH OTHERS?
WANT TO TAKE YOUR SKILLS TO THE NEXT LEVEL?
If you answered YES to any of these questions, Cascade Ski School invites you to attend hiring clinics at Snoqualmie Summit West in December.

Improve your skiing or riding
Learn presentation skills
Learn interpersonal & group presentation techniques
Work and learn with others who have the same passion

Cascade Ski School selects part-time instructors and cadets from this hiring clinic. If hired, you will receive: seasons pass lift benefits, discounts for immediate family members, ongoing education, free in-house clinics, and lots of fun.
There is no fee for the hiring clinic.   Minimum ability level: level 7 skiing and level 4 snowboarding.

Click here to sign up and we will get back to you!
